command.name: AUTOGREET
command.syntax: /ChanServ SET #<channel> AUTOGREET <new description> /ChanServ SET #<channel> AUTOGREET /ChanServ SET #<channel> AUTOGREET OFF
command.desc: AUTOGREET sets up an automatic message, which ChanServ will send to everyone who joins the channel. The message can be disabled by supplying "OFF" as the only argument. It can be viewed by either joining the channel, through the INFO command or by not specifying a new message in the command.

ex.pre: To change or set an autogreet for the channel #Sorcery
To disable the autogreet message for #IRCSkills
